entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Richer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
